sentence.Network_en: What will you do to atone for this sin?
sentence.Network_cn: 你将做什么来赎这罪 呢 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...类发展的barrier/barricade，甚至是会给人类带来bale的bane(毒药, 祸害)。”终其一生，哈伯教授都avid(渴望的)为自己的罪过做一些atone(弥补)。但所有的atonement1都为时已晚。编辑：

list.abs: atonia 弛缓atonic bladder 弛缓性膀胱atonic bleeding 弛缓性出血
atonic bladder 弛缓性膀胱atonic bleeding 弛缓性出血atonic ulcer 弛缓性溃疡
 3、限定的救赎（Limited Atonement）：上帝对人类的拯救，不是全部拯救。 上帝只拯救一些人，却任凭其他人沈沦。
加尔文学派所看重的一个观点是有限的救赎(limited atonement)，首先由柯拜斯的歌德士加(Godescalc of Orbais)所定位，他是第九世 …
atonic bleeding 弛缓性出血atonic ulcer 弛缓性溃疡atony 弛缓

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (originally in the sense 'make or become united or reconciled', rare before the 16th cent.): from at one in early use; later by back-formation from atonement

entry.def: If you atone for something that you have done, you do something to show that you are sorry you did it.

example.ex: He felt he had atoned for what he had done to his son...
example.tran: 他觉得他对儿子已无亏欠。

means.word_mean: 2. turn away from sin or do penitence

auth_sentence.content: Victory would atone for his agonising defeat by a nose last year.
auth_sentence.res_content: Victory would atone for his agonising defeat by a nose last year.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Victory would atone for his agonising defeat by a nose last year.

auth_sentence.content: Then is there mirth in heaven, When earthly things made even Atone together.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then is there mirth in heaven, When earthly things made even Atone together.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then is there mirth in heaven, When earthly things made even Atone together.

auth_sentence.content: "I have a lot to atone for but there's one issue I really want to discuss," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "I have a lot to atone for but there's one issue I really want to discuss," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "I have a lot to atone for but there's one issue I really want to discuss," he said.

sentences.en: He promised to atone for his crime.
